input.sentences: there was 100 children in attendance for space day festivities .
their teacher kicked off the day with an exciting slide show .
it told the history of space travel .
the kids were asked to write a short essay on their thoughts about space travel .
the best essay was chosen and an award was given !
output.sentences: The students gathered for the presentation at the space museum.
The lady was very interesting in her presentation.
The short film about the moon landing was fun.
The kids did some fun learning activities.
